Proof of concept, use rot13 on python src, load and decrypt using VM then `exec` it.

```py
if __name__ == "__main__":
    Vm(
      [4, 0, 161, 118, 122, 99, 98, 101, 103, 32, 117, 103, 103, 99, 107, 10, 10, 113, 114, 115, 32, 110, 113, 113, 40, 110, 44, 32, 111, 41, 58, 10, 9, 101, 114, 103, 104, 101, 97, 32, 110, 32, 43, 32, 111, 10, 10, 110, 32, 61, 32, 53, 10, 111, 32, 61, 32, 49, 48, 10, 107, 32, 61, 32, 110, 113, 113, 40, 110, 44, 32, 111, 41, 10, 10, 99, 101, 118, 97, 103, 40, 115, 34, 123, 110, 125, 43, 123, 111, 125, 61, 123, 107, 125, 34, 41, 10, 10, 99, 101, 118, 97, 103, 40, 34, 102, 103, 110, 103, 104, 102, 45, 112, 98, 113, 114, 58, 34, 44, 32, 117, 103, 103, 99, 107, 46, 116, 114, 103, 40, 39, 117, 103, 103, 99, 102, 58, 47, 47, 116, 98, 98, 116, 121, 114, 46, 112, 98, 122, 39, 41, 46, 102, 103, 110, 103, 104, 102, 95, 112, 98, 113, 114, 41, 5, 0, 50, 161, 13]
    ).run()

```
